plot outline: Romantic family film that revolves around love and relationships. Karam Singh Sandhu is the modern patriarch of the Sandhu Group of Companies. He lives with his two sons, Sukhdeep and Rajbir. While Sukhdeep looks after the business, Rajbir is the pampered one. Kang is the fun loving librarian, who has not worked a day in his life, but has to work extra hard to convince his ladyloves' eccentric family that he possesses all the qualities they want in their would be son-in-law. Sukhdeep meets Aman and both fall in love with each other. When the time comes for Sukhdeep to propose to Aman, her past resurfaces. Karam Singh arranges the marriage of Sukhdeep to Harleen and then later finds out that he has arranged his elder son to marry the girl his younger son loves.
title: Yaara O Dildaara
plot: A woman jeopardizes her relationship when she harbors a secret from the man that she loves.
